info.title: BotArmy Backend
info.summary: Complete backend API for BotArmy multi-agent system with HITL oversight and workflow orchestration
info.description: BotArmy POC Backend Services - Multi-Agent Orchestration Platform

post.description: Create a new project.

get.description: Get project status and tasks.

post.description: Create a new task for a project.

get.description: Get detailed project completion status.

post.description: Check if project is complete and trigger completion if so.
Force project completion (admin function).
Respond to a HITL request with approve, reject, or amend actions.

get.description: Get a specific HITL request.
Get the history of a HITL request.

schema.title: Response Get Hitl Request History Api V1 Hitl  Request Id  History Get

get.description: Get all HITL requests for a project.

schema.title: Response Get Project Hitl Requests Api V1 Hitl Project  Project Id  Requests Get

post.description: Bulk approve multiple HITL requests.

get.description: Get full context for a HITL request including artifacts and task details.
Get HITL statistics for monitoring and analytics.

post.description: Configure a HITL trigger condition.

schema.title: Response Configure Hitl Trigger Condition Api V1 Hitl Config Trigger Condition Post

post.description: Set oversight level for a project.

schema.title: Response Set Project Oversight Level Api V1 Hitl Project  Project Id  Oversight Level Post

get.description: Get oversight level for a project.

schema.title: Response Get Project Oversight Level Api V1 Hitl Project  Project Id  Oversight Level Get

post.description: Clean up expired HITL requests.

schema.title: Response Cleanup Expired Hitl Requests Api V1 Hitl Cleanup Expired Post

get.description: Get pending HITL requests with optional project filtering.

schema.title: Response Get Pending Hitl Requests Api V1 Hitl Pending Get

get.description: Basic health check endpoint.
Detailed health check with component status.
Readiness check for Kubernetes/container orchestration.

Kubernetes-style /healthz endpoint for comprehensive service monitoring.

This endpoint provides a comprehensive health check suitable for
Kubernetes liveness probes and external monitoring systems.
Get current status of all agents.

schema.title: Response Get All Agent Statuses Api V1 Agents Status Get

get.description: Get current status of a specific agent.
Get status history for a specific agent from database.

post.description: Reset agent status to idle (admin function).
Generate downloadable artifacts for a completed project.

get.description: Get summary of available artifacts for a project.
Download project artifacts as a ZIP file.

delete.description: Clean up generated artifacts for a project.

post.description: Clean up old artifact files (admin endpoint).

get.description:
Retrieve filtered audit events.

Returns a list of audit events based on the provided filters.
Events are ordered by creation time (newest first).

parameters.name: limit

schema.description: Maximum number of events to return
schema.title: Limit

parameters.description: Maximum number of events to return

schema.title: Response Get Audit Events Api V1 Audit Events Get

get.description: Retrieve a specific audit event by ID.

Retrieve audit events for a specific project.

Returns all audit events associated with the given project ID.

parameters.name: limit

schema.description: Maximum number of events to return
schema.title: Limit

parameters.description: Maximum number of events to return

schema.title: Response Get Project Audit Events Api V1 Audit Projects  Project Id  Events Get

get.description:
Retrieve audit events for a specific task.

Returns all audit events associated with the given task ID.

parameters.name: limit

schema.description: Maximum number of events to return
schema.title: Limit

parameters.description: Maximum number of events to return

schema.title: Response Get Task Audit Events Api V1 Audit Tasks  Task Id  Events Get

get.description:
List all available templates.

Returns:
    List of template metadata

schema.title: Response List Templates Api V1 Workflows Templates Get

get.description:
Get metadata for a specific template.

Args:
    template_id: ID of the template

Returns:
    Template metadata

post.description:
Render a template with provided variables.

Args:
    request: Template render request

Returns:
    Rendered template content

Validate variables for a template without rendering.

Args:
    request: Template validation request

Returns:
    Validation results

get.description:
List all available workflows.

Returns:
    List of workflow metadata

schema.title: Response List Workflows Api V1 Workflows Workflows Get

get.description:
Get metadata for a specific workflow.

Args:
    workflow_id: ID of the workflow

Returns:
    Workflow metadata

post.description:
Start execution of a workflow.

Args:
    request: Workflow execution request

Returns:
    Workflow execution details

Advance workflow execution to the next step.

Args:
    request: Workflow advance request

Returns:
    Updated execution status

get.description:
Get the current status of a workflow execution.

Args:
    execution_id: ID of the workflow execution

Returns:
    Execution status information

post.description:
Generate a handoff for agent transition.

Args:
    execution_id: ID of the workflow execution
    request: Handoff generation request

Returns:
    Generated handoff information

get.description:
Validate the current state of a workflow execution.

Args:
    execution_id: ID of the workflow execution

Returns:
    Validation results

List all available agent teams.

Returns:
    List of team metadata

schema.title: Response List Agent Teams Api V1 Workflows Teams Get

get.description:
Get metadata for a specific agent team.

Args:
    team_id: ID of the team

Returns:
    Team metadata

Get agent teams compatible with a specific workflow.

Args:
    workflow_id: ID of the workflow

Returns:
    List of compatible teams

Validate the composition of an agent team.

Args:
    team_id: ID of the team

Returns:
    Validation results

post.description:
Clear all service caches.

Returns:
    Cache clearing status

get.description:
Get health status of BMAD Core services.

Returns:
    Health status information

post.description:
Create a new ADK-powered agent instance with specified configuration.

This endpoint creates an agent using the ADK (Agent Development Kit) framework,
providing enhanced capabilities and enterprise controls.

get.description: Get details of a specific ADK agent instance.

delete.description: Delete an ADK agent instance and clean up resources.

get.description: List all active ADK agent instances with their status and configuration.

schema.title: Response List Adk Agents Api V1 Adk Agents Get

get.description: Get current ADK rollout configuration and percentages for each agent type.

post.description:
Update ADK rollout percentages for different agent types.

This allows gradual rollout of ADK features with user-based consistency.

Create a collaborative workflow with multiple ADK agents.

This endpoint initiates a GroupChat-based workflow where multiple agents
collaborate on complex tasks using structured handoffs and context sharing.

get.description: List all active multi-agent workflows with their current status.

schema.title: Response List Active Workflows Api V1 Adk Orchestration Workflows Get

get.description: Get detailed status and progress of a specific multi-agent workflow.

delete.description: Terminate an active multi-agent workflow and clean up resources.

post.description:
Execute a collaborative analysis using multiple ADK agents.

This endpoint triggers a structured analysis workflow where agents work
together to provide comprehensive insights and recommendations.

Create a structured handoff between two ADK agents.

This endpoint establishes a formal handoff with context preservation,
validation, and progress tracking between agents in a workflow.

get.description: List all active agent handoffs with their current status.

schema.title: Response List Active Handoffs Api V1 Adk Handoffs Get

get.description: Get detailed status and progress of a specific agent handoff.

delete.description: Cancel an active agent handoff and notify involved agents.

post.description:
Execute an agent handoff by transferring context and initiating the receiving agent's work.

This endpoint streams the handoff execution progress and results.

get.description:
List all available ADK workflow templates with their metadata.

Templates provide structured workflows for different types of collaborative tasks.

schema.title: Response List Adk Workflow Templates Api V1 Adk Templates Get

get.description: Get detailed information about a specific ADK workflow template.
Get list of agents compatible with a specific ADK workflow template.

schema.title: Response Get Template Compatible Agents Api V1 Adk Templates Template Id Agents Get

get.description:
List all available ADK tools with their capabilities and status.

This includes OpenAPI tools, function tools, and specialized tools.

schema.title: Response List Available Adk Tools Api V1 Adk Tools Get

get.description: Get detailed information about a specific ADK tool including capabilities and usage.

post.description:
Execute an ADK tool with enterprise controls and HITL oversight.

This endpoint applies risk assessment, parameter sanitization, and human approval
for high-risk operations before tool execution.

Register a new OpenAPI specification as an ADK tool.

This endpoint parses the OpenAPI spec and creates enterprise-controlled
tool wrappers for each endpoint with risk assessment and HITL integration.

get.description:
Search for ADK tools by name, description, or capabilities.

Supports fuzzy matching and filtering by tool type and agent compatibility.

schema.title: Response Search Adk Tools Api V1 Adk Tools Search Get

get.description: Get comprehensive health status of the ADK system including agents, tools, and orchestration services.

Get usage metrics and performance statistics for ADK components.

Includes agent performance, tool usage, workflow success rates, and system utilization.
